name: Extreme Bike Stunt Trial
description:
Extreme Bike Stunt Trial is the best moto stunt racing games on the store. Extreme Bike Stunt Trial is extremely challenging and adventurous game for furious stunt rider and high jump lovers. This tricky bike race game is very exciting and best time killer for supermoto racing bikers

Features:
• Extreme stunts
• Snow mode and sunny mode
• Multiple controls e.g. tilt and button controls
• Multiple challenging missions
• Real Physics controls on all bikes
• Graphics quality
• Offline game play
